name: Brick Breaker Premium
description: The classic brick-breaker game is back! 35 Challenging Levels to Complete. Heroic Storyline, Where It All Began. Gamepad Support. Classic Power-ups. See Ending Cutscenes If You Can Complete The Game. It's Addictive and Loads of Fun! Good Luck!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
